TextView.android:text: The largest hill station in the Sahyadri range of Maharashtra, Mahabaleshwar has a legendary past that relates to the Shiva Temple located in Old Mahabaleshwar. With magnificent views of one of the evergreen forests in India, Mahabaleshwar is the originating point of River Krishna that flows across Maharashtra, and its four tributaries Koyna, Venna, Savitri and Gayatri that travel from the mouth of the statue of a cow at the Shiva Temple before merging into Krishna. Offering spectacular views of the mountains that surround this place, Mahabaleshwar is truly a paradise for all the nature lovers.
